掠.definition: to take over by force; to rob; to plunder; to brush over; to skim; to sweep

掠取.definition: to plunder; to pillage; to loot

掠美.definition: to claim credit due to others

掠賣.definition: to press-gang sb and sell into slavery

掠過.definition: to flit across; to sweep past; to glance (strike at an angle)
